title: Saratoga National Historical Park: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping        There are no lodging or dining facilities available at the Park.  Our museum store carries bottled water and some snacks (i.e. trail mix). For more information on local dining or lodging, please check with the local Chambers of Commerce:  Schuylerville Area Chamber of Commerce 43 Spring St. (Rte.29) PO Box 19 Schuylerville, NY 12871 518-695-5268  Saratoga County Chamber of Commerce 28 Clinton Street Saratoga Springs, NY 12866 518-584-3255 Southern Saratoga County Chamber of Commerce 15 Park Avenue Clifton Park, NY 12065 518-371-7748 Additional information for both the local area and beyond can be found on the official New York State tourism website.
